attributes.action: abandon the occupation of Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There seems no reason for British policing, laws, rules and regulations to be in place in the North of Ireland. This should be left to the Irish Governement and the people. The unlawful occupation should be finally be ended by all soilders returning to Britain and Loyalists living in Ireland be offered the chance to return to live in their home country.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
